headline.main: Nutrition Panel Calls for Less Sugar and Eases Cholesterol and Fat Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Panel Calls for Less Sugar and Eases Cholesterol Restrictions

docs.abstract: A nutrition advisory panel that helps shape the country’s official dietary guidelines recommended sharp new limits on the amount of added sugars that Americans should consume.
docs.snippet: A nutrition advisory panel that helps shape the country’s official dietary guidelines recommended sharp new limits on the amount of added sugars that Americans should consume.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas county issued a marriage license to a same-sex couple on Thursday, the first legal certification for a gay couple in the state since its voters about a decade ago approved a measure defining marriage as only being between a man and a woman.

headline.main: Texas County Issues Historic Marriage License to Same-Sex Couple
headline.print_headline: Texas County Issues Historic Marriage License to Same-Sex Couple

docs.snippet: A Texas county issued a marriage license to a same-sex couple on Thursday, the first legal certification for a gay couple in the state since its voters about a decade ago approved a measure defining marriage as only being between a man and a woman.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal agency says Wal-Mart discriminated against a lesbian employee who sought health coverage for her ailing wife and has ordered "a just resolution" for violating her civil rights.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Feds Say Wal-Mart Was Biased Against Lesbians
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Feds Say Wal-Mart Was Biased Against Lesbians

docs.snippet: A federal agency says Wal-Mart discriminated against a lesbian employee who sought health coverage for her ailing wife and has ordered "a just resolution" for violating her civil rights.

docs.lead_paragraph: The insolvency of CoOportunity Health raised the question of whether a major Affordable Care Act experiment in holding down insurance costs was in trouble beyond Iowa and Nebraska.

headline.main: Health Care Success for Midwest Co-op Proves Its Undoing
headline.print_headline: Health Care Success for Midwest Co-op Proves Its Undoing

docs.abstract: Failure of CoOportunity Health raises questions about the viability of some 23 nonprofit cooperatives created under the Affordable Care Act to generate competition for traditional insurers; organization became a victim of its own success, attracting 120,000 customers in Iowa and Nebraska that brought with them an unexpectedly high level of health costs; CoOportunity customers are now scrambling to find new insurance.
docs.snippet: The insolvency of CoOportunity Health raised the question of whether a major Affordable Care Act experiment in holding down insurance costs was in trouble beyond Iowa and Nebraska.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Genes Tell Only Part of the Story
headline.print_headline: Genes Tell Only Part of Story

docs.abstract: The lives of patients are far more complex, and messier, than science can explain.
docs.snippet: The lives of patients are far more complex, and messier, than science can explain.

docs.abstract: Complicated grief, as it is known, is more than just a life-disrupting emotional response. It can result in a physical and psychological decline.
docs.snippet: Complicated grief, as it is known, is more than just a life-disrupting emotional response. It can result in a physical and psychological decline.
